attributes.action: Pledge to hold a National Referendum on the acceptance or rejection of any European Constitution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any Government or Prime Minister cannot truly be said to know the will of the people unless the people are enabled to express that will in a democratic manner. In the case of such a potentially major change to the character of our Nation as would be the case if a supra-national constitution is endorsed it is imperative that the will of the people is sought and not ignored. Politicians of all parties should remember that they are the representative of the people and not our oligarchs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
